trans-unit.source: Specifies the panel that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter" /> creates for the layout of the items of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter" /> 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 的项的布局创建的面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate> specifies the panel that is used for the layout of items.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.Panel%2A> property that is of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> types have an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property that is of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>.
Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> type has a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>.

For the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class, the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> value is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate> that specifies a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
For the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the default uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>.
For <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, the default uses <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WrapPanel>.
For <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>, the default uses <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.

To create a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, you can create a template that specifies a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> and set it as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，你可以创建一个模板，指定水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>和将其设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> <xref:System.Windows.Style> that creates a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to create a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> that has rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>创建水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>具有圆角。

trans-unit.source: Note that in this example, instead of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property as in previous example, the horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is specified within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在此示例中，而不是设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>如前面的示例所示的属性、 水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>内指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A> property is set to `true` on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, indicating that the generated items should go in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A>属性设置为`true`上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>，表明生成的项应在面板中。

trans-unit.source: When you specify it this way, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> cannot be replaced by the user of the control without using a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 当这种方式，指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>无法由该控件的用户不使用的情况下替换<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, only do this if you know you wouldn't want the panel to be replaced without the use of a template.
trans-unit.target: 因此，只有这样做你知道你不想要替换而不使用模板的面板。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can do the following to achieve the same results.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以执行以下操作来实现相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter> creates the panel for the layout of the items based on what is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter>创建由指定的基于内容的项的布局面板<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use the different styling and templating properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在使用不同的样式和模板化属性的示例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate" /> class.
Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElementFactory" /> object that represents the template.
Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate" /> class with the specified template.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的模板初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The element this template is applied to.
This must be an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter" /> object.
Checks that the templated parent is a non-null <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 检查模板化父级是否为非 null <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The method uses the following rules:
The `templatedParent` cannot be `null`.
The `templatedParent` must be an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter>.
<paramref name="templatedParent" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="templatedParent" /> is not an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter" />.
